content: उपचयः {@--1@} Accumulation, addition, accession. {@--2@} Increase, growth, excess; बल° <ls>K. 105</ls>; स्वशक्त्युपचये <ls>Śi. 2. 57</ls>; अंभसामुपचयाय <ls n="Śi.">9. 32</ls>; भाग्य° <ls>Ratn. 1. 6</ls> dawn of good fortune; so ज्ञान°, मांस°. {@--3@} Quantity, heap. {@--4@} Prosperity, elevation, rise. {@--5@} The third, sixth, tenth and eleventh house or position from the first of a zodiacal sign (or a {%lagna%} <ab>q. v.</ab>).
